question: How can I cancel my contract?
answer: You can cancel via the self-service portal under “My subscription” → “Cancel”, or call support at 21 00 00 within opening hours.

question: Why is my invoice higher this month?
answer: Extra charges may include add-ons, roaming, or late fees. Check your invoice details in the portal → “Billing”.

question: Do you have 5G in my area?
answer: Check the coverage map on our website. 5G is available in major cities and expanding monthly.

question: How does EU roaming work?
answer: Within EEA you use your domestic allowance at no extra cost. Fair usage limits may apply.

question: How can I speak to an agent?
answer: Use chat in the portal or call 21 00 00 (Mon–Fri 08–18). For urgent outages, choose option 1.
